name: AVMutableDateRangeMetadataGroup
desc: A mutable collection of metadata items that are valid for use within a specific range of dates.

items.name: var items: [AVMetadataItem]
items.desc: An array of associated metadata items.

items.name: var startDate: Date
items.desc: The start date for the metadata date range group.

items.name: var endDate: Date?
items.desc: The end date for the metadata date range group.
